official_title: A bill to require physician visits to patients in skilled nursing facilities at least once every 30 days.

summary.text: Amends Title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to provide that nursing homes participating in the Medicare program must furnish a physician who visits patients not less than once every 30 days and that a physician be available to furnish necessary medical care in case of emergency.

titles.title: A bill to require physician visits to patients in skilled nursing facilities at least once every 30 days.
